attributes.action: Provide secure schooling/borstals for blatant anti social children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that we re-introduce secure schooling or borstal style accommodation for young anti social children. Ideally within 3 offences they should be given a short term stay with hard line tactics to reintegrate them and hopefully see the end of the bad behaviour and some hope for the future instaed of waiting until they are teens and harder to work with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
